markdownRemark.html:
Do not ignore

Do not use@ts-ignore. It turns off the compilr completely from the next line and prevents from spotting type errors

Do not use React.FunctionComponent Eee:

type Props = { foo: string }
const Foo: React.FunctionComponent<Props> = ({ foo }) => <div>{foo}</div>

Approved:

const Foo = ({ foo }: Props) => <div>{foo}</div>

Do not use enums

Nope:

enum Direction { Up, Down, Left, Right}

Jaaaa:

type Direction = "up" | "down" | "left" | "right"

Do not us wide types lik objct or any

Always try to find concrete types
